description: This is blood taken from Shoggoth. The blood itself is wriggling at a slow rate, even though it hasn't been touched by anything. If you intend to use it, you will need a syringe...
This is blood taken from Shoggoth. The blood itself is wriggling at a slow rate, even though it hasn't been touched by anything. If you intend to use it, you will need a syringe...
It is a liquid obtained by altering Maid Point. When ingested, it can trigger a mutation that awakens the primordial spirit of service that has long been a part of humanity.
